dialogue_metadata.inferred_vibe: Skeptical and critical discussion of a news event

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, is airport security just... totally useless now, or what? I mean, Almaty.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, is airport security just... totally useless now, or what? I mean, Almaty.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, um, the Deputy Minister of Internal Affairs, Sanzhar Adilov, he, like, commented on the work of security during the hostage taking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, um, the Deputy Minister of Internal Affairs, Sanzhar Adilov, he, like, commented on the work of security during the hostage taking.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Deputy Minister of Internal Affairs Sanzhar Adilov commented on the work of the security service at Almaty airport during the hostage taking.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Commented." Right. Does "commented" mean they actually have a plan beyond, you know, blaming someone else?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Commented. Right. Does commented mean they actually have a plan beyond, you know, blaming someone else?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He's saying there were, uh, certain changes back in 2009. Security, it used to be assigned to the transport police unit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He's saying there were, uh, certain changes back in two thousand nine. Security, it used to be assigned to the transport police unit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2009, there were certain changes - if earlier security was assigned to the transport police unit, now, after legislative changes, security has been assigned to the airport aviation security service,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, 2009. So, for, like, thirteen years they've had this different system that just, you know, failed spectacularlâ€“y.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, two thousand nine. So, for, like, thirteen years they've had this different system that just, you know, failed spectacularl-y.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, but, like, after legislative changes, it went to the airport's own aviation security service.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, but, like, after legislative changes, it went to the airport's own aviation security service.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: if earlier security was assigned to the transport police unit, now, after legislative changes, security has been assigned to the airport aviation security service,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And that's supposed to be better? A guy with a kitchen knife takes someone hostage right there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And that's supposed to be better? A guy with a kitchen knife takes someone hostage right there?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On March 7, Kazakhstanis were shocked by the news that a man armed with a kitchen knife took an employee of the Almaty airport hostage.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They're saying many legislative amendments adopted earlier will be revised.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're saying many legislative amendments adopted earlier will be revised.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to him, many legislative amendments adopted earlier will be revised.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Revised." Is that code for "we'll just move the blame around again," then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Revised. Is that code for we'll just move the blame around again, then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, look, based on the investigation and the inspection, they'll make a submission in accordance with Article 200 of the Criminal Procedure Code.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, look, based on the investigation and the inspection, they'll make a submission in accordance with Article two hundred of the Criminal Procedure Code.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: And based on the results of both the investigation of the criminal case and the inspection, a submission will be made in accordance with Article 200 of the Criminal Procedure Code, and we will raise the issue of revising the current algorithms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Article 200. Yeah, that sounds like, like, paperwork. Meanwhile, a random civilian had to save the hostage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Article two hundred. Yeah, that sounds like, like, paperwork. Meanwhile, a random civilian had to save the hostage.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the end, the hostage was saved by a man who came to see his relatives off.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They're forming working groups now, um, inspections have begun. They will, uh, revise the current algorithms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're forming working groups now, um, inspections have begun. They will, uh, revise the current algorithms.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Working groups have now been created, inspections have begun, and based on the results of the inspections, we will report on the measures taken, and if there are any shortcomings, we will bring them to the public,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Algorithms. Right. Because the problem was definitely, like, a software glitch, not, you know, actual security personnel.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Algorithms. Right. Because the problem was definitely, like, a software glitch, not, you know, actual security personnel.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And if there are any shortcomings, Adilov said they will, uh, bring them to the public.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And if there are any shortcomings, Adilov said they will, uh, bring them to the public.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: and if there are any shortcomings, we will bring them to the public," the deputy minister added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, they'll tell us! After, like, a kitchen knife incident. How, um, reassuring.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, they'll tell us! After, like, a kitchen knife incident. How, um, reassuring.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The man grabbed the employee by the hair, like, and began to threaten her with the knife after security officers asked for documents.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The man grabbed the employee by the hair, like, and began to threaten her with the knife after security officers asked for documents.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The MAA aviation security service officers asked the man to show his documents, and in response, he grabbed the employee by the hair and began to threaten her with a knife.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and then someone just... walked in and saved her. Not, like, the newly revised aviation security service, huh?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and then someone just... walked in and saved her. Not, like, the newly revised aviation security service, huh?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the end, the hostage was saved by a man who came to see his relatives off.
